name: Aries
description: Irena, known as Aries, rules over war and courage, granting mortals the will to fight and the spirit to press forward.

upgrades.level3: Increases Lifesteal gained to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.141)

skills.name: Swipe 'Em
skills.description: Deals 270% ATK as DMG to the nearest target and knocks them down.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Reduces the Move SPD & ATK SPD of hit enemies by 50% for 5s. (Unlocks at Lv.121)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)

skills.name: Aries Pounce
skills.description: Aries leaps up and slams down, dealing 360% ATK as DMG to enemies in a cone and knocking them back.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 400% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Ignores 20% of the targets' Armor. (Unlocks at Lv.101)
